definition.text: Let's get on with it! The Trading Bot outputs dozens of products, and they're all featured in three separate layer managers: Hi! I'm going to show you everything about the layers of the trading bot... the ones featured on charts associated with trading sessions!

paragraphs.text: Trading Engine features layers that turn on and off the reporting of values of nodes in the Trading Engine hierarchy.
Trading System features layers that turn on and off multiple types of reports at the level of the Trading System.
Simulation Objects features layers that affect the rendering of visual information over the charts.
